description.narrative: Improve conflict-affected communities' and individuals' opportunities for economic reintegration and access to social services, which will accelerate Cote d'Ivoire's crisis recovery and strengthen the prosects for sustainable peace in its territory.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 11.) | Description :By July 31, 2007, recruit a FiduciaryManagement Agency | Due Date :31-Jul-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 3.) | Description :One month after Effectiveness, recruit aproject Coordinator | Due Date :07-Sep-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 4.) | Description :One month after effectiveness, set outoperating modalities for Community Rehabilitation | Due Date :07-Sep-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 5.) | Description :Maintain personnel and resources responsiblefor Regional coordination | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 5.) | Description :Maintain the Steering Committee | Due Date:31-Dec-2013

Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 6.) | Description :One month after effectiveness, reruit animplementing agency for parts 1(a)(i) and (ii) of the project | Due Date :07-Sep-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 7.) | Description :Maintain Community Rehabilitation Unit | DueDate :31-Dec-2013
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part A, para 8.) | Description :One month after effectiveness, recruit to theIdentification Unit 4 specialists | Due Date :07-Sep-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part C, para 1) | Description :One month after effectiveness, adopt projectmanuals | Due Date :07-Sep-2007
Finance Agreement :H323-IVC (Schedule 2, Section I, Part D, para 1) | Description :No later than 6 months after Effectiveness,prepare Environmental and Social Framework | Due Date :07-Feb-2008
